name: An American Cathedral
description:
This is my Spring 2022 Media Arts and Science Capstone. I wanted to show my skills in both pre-production, production, and post-production. All models and textures are created by me. 

There is not much to this place yet, but if enough people like it, that might change. 

Please checkout my YouTube and or website! 
 

https://www.alexanderjnichols.com/
